com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Interface ITextFieldRenderer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITextFieldRendererProxy

    public interface ITextFieldRenderer
    Interface handling the rendering of text fields.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDefaultHeight()
      Returns the default height.
      java.awt.Rectangle getTextArea(Context context, java.lang.String title)
      Returns the location of the text box.
      int renderTextField(Context context, java.lang.String title, boolean focus, java.lang.String content, int position, int select, int boxPosition, boolean insertMode)
      Renders the text field.
      int transformToCharPos(Context context, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String content, int boxPosition)
      Maps the current mouse cursor position to a character index.

    • Method Detail

      • renderTextField

        int renderTextField(Context context,
                    java.lang.String title,
                    boolean focus,
                    java.lang.String content,
                    int position,
                    int select,
                    int boxPosition,
                    boolean insertMode)
        Renders the text field.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to be used
        title - the title of the text field
        focus - the focus state of the text field
        content - the text field content
        position - the cursor position
        select - the boundary of the selection
        boxPosition - the text render offset
        insertMode - true, if in override, rather than insert mode
        Returns:
        the new cursor position

      • getDefaultHeight

        int getDefaultHeight()
        Returns the default height.
        Returns:
        the default height

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • transformToCharPos

        int transformToCharPos(Context context,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String content,
                       int boxPosition)
        Maps the current mouse cursor position to a character index.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to be used
        title - the title of the text field
        content - the text field content
        boxPosition - the text render offset
        Returns:
        the character position
